title: Qualified with April Beyer Episode 3
itunes:title: Qualified with April Beyer Episode 3
itunes:subtitle: April Beyer is back as Anna’s co-host for the final episode of 2021! Anna and April talk first with Mary whose two best friendships are called into question after a past conversation revealed that the three of them have differing political views. Missing
description:
April Beyer is back as Anna’s co-host for the final episode of 2021! Anna and April talk first with Mary whose two best friendships are called into question after a past conversation revealed that the three of them have differing political views. Missing her friends, Mary wonders how or if the relationships can be repaired.

Their next call is with Michele whose son’s upcoming marriage has her family debating whether to invite the groom’s father. While every wedding brings a certain amount of stress, Michele’s ex-husband’s dependency issues have the potential to create even more drama and Michele wonders if inviting him is worth taking the chance.

Thank you to everyone listening, calling in and supporting Unqualified in 2021! We will be back in January with new episodes and more great guests!

If you have a question and would like to talk with Anna, please reach out! Go to: unqualified.com/talk-with-anna

State Farm  Like a good neighbor State Farm is there.  Call or go to Statefarm.com for a quote today.

Please subscribe to Anna Faris is Unqualified on Apple Podcasts and follow us on social media:

Instagram @Unqualified
Twitter @Unqualified
Facebook @Anna Faris is Unqualified
Music by: Mondo Cozmo @mondocozmo
Producers: Michael Barrett, Rob Holysz, Jeph Porter, Kasper Selvig
Researcher: Margot Barrett

Production Services: Rabbit Grin Productions rabbitgrinproductions.com
